titles.title: American Tank Car Modernization Act of 2025
American Tank Car Modernization Act of 2025
To provide for a grant program for adoption of certain telematics systems onboard freight railcars, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
